ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: My thanks to Antje Weisheimer for helpful comments on an earlier version of the manuscript, to Anders Persson for informing me about the Curie et al. letter advocating the establishment of an International Bureau of Meteorology and to Dennis Lehmkuhl for supplying further background information about this remarkable letter. I would also like to thank Bjorn Stevens, not only for helpful comments on the paper, but also for considerable support in developing a proposal for the European Programme on Extreme Climate and Computing, mentioned in this paper. The author would also like to thank the reviewers for their very helpful comments.
